textBeforeTable: Best Of Show (404 entries) Due to unforeseen circumstances, the mailing of the scoresheets and prizes for the Eight Annual Virginia Beer Blitz will be delayed until the week after Christmas. Please accept our sincere apologies for the delay. Thanks to all of this year's sponsors, judges, and stewards, who made this event possible! The Eighth Annual Virginia Beer Blitz judged 404 entries this year in all 28 BJCP categories, including Mead and Cider. Presented by The Colonial AleSmiths and Keggers (CASK) Saturday, December 13, 2014 at 9:00 AM St. George Brewing Company, Hampton Virginia Blue Mountain Brewery Brooklyn Brewing Company Northern Brewer Avery Brewing Co. Merchant du Vin
